code:
```verilog
[BEGIN]
module TopModule (
    input logic a,
    input logic b,
    output logic q
);
    // Combinational logic: q is the AND of a and b
    always @(*) begin
        q = a & b; // Proper usage of logic types
    end
endmodule
[DONE]
```
